permission.name: Manage Lists
permission.description: Enables user to create a new list/table within the catalog.

permission.name: Create Data
permission.description: Enables user to create a new entry in a list

permission.name: Load Data
permission.description: Enables user to load data records

permission.name: Delete Data
permission.description: Enables user to delete an entry in a list

permission.name: Update Data
permission.description: Enables user to update data in a list

permission.name: Search Data
permission.description: Enables user to update data in a list

permission.name: Manage events
permission.description: Enables user to use the api to create, schedule, enable or disable events.

permission.name: Manage Users and Groups
permission.description: Enables user to use the api to create and manage users and groups

permission.name: Manage Modules
permission.description: Enables user to use the api to create and manage new modules
